term.title: direct (radiochemical) isotope dilution analysis

item.text: Isotope dilution analysis used for the determination of a non-radioactive element with the aid of one of its radionuclides.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2521 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)
